summary: Nadya Klyueva is a single woman. Persuaded by her friend, she decides to charm her co-worker whom she doesn't really love, but who is the most popular man around.
cast: Irina Muravyova|Tatyana Vasileva|Aleksandr Abdulov|Leonid Kuravlyov|Mikhail Kokshenov|Lyudmila Ivanova|Larisa Udovichenko|Vladimir Nosik|Aleksandr Shirvindt|Lev Perfilov|Lyubov Sokolova|Veronika Izotova|Viktor Ilichyov|G. Abesadze|Anatoly Eyramdzhan|Viktor Filippov|Lyudmila Karaush|Ekaterina Kuravlyova|Georgiy Martirosyan|Vladimir Myshkin|Ya. Sarkisov|Vera Sotnikova|Igor Yasulovich
title: Samaya obayatelnaya i privlekatelnaya
